TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AsyncCompletedEventHandler(object sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AsyncCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AsyncCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AsyncCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void AsyncCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type AsyncCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * AsyncCompletedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: An that contains the event data.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: Represents the method that will handle the *MethodName* event of an asynchronous operation.

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the *MethodName* event of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Se llama al método de controlador de eventos cada vez que se produce el evento, a menos que quite al delegado.The event-handler method is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controlador de eventos, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). Para un método asincrónico, denominado *MethodName*, en el componente, tendrá una correspondiente *MethodName* `Completed` eventos y opcional *MethodName* `CompletedEventArgs` clase.For an asynchronous method, called *MethodName*, in your component, you will have a corresponding *MethodName*`Completed` event, and an optional *MethodName*`CompletedEventArgs` class. Para un componente que admite varias invocaciones simultáneas de sus métodos asincrónicos, el cliente puede proporcionar un token único o Id. de tarea, para distinguir qué tarea asincrónica está generando eventos concretos.For a component that supports multiple concurrent invocations of its asynchronous methods, the client can supply a unique token, or task ID, to distinguish which asynchronous task is raising particular events. El cliente puede leer el propiedad para determinar qué tarea está informando de finalización.The client's can read the property to determine which task is reporting completion. La implementación debe utilizar el para crear un que asocia la tarea del cliente con los identificadores de las tareas asincrónicas pendientes.Your implementation should use the to create an that associates the client's task IDs with pending asynchronous tasks. ## Examples Para obtener un ejemplo de código de la delegado, vea el ejemplo de la clase.For a code example of the delegate, see the example in the class.
